page.title: 08Horse Riding at Eastchurch
page.content: Riding is a very popular{recreation on Sheppey because there is not much for young people to do, particularly on Saturdays and Sundays. One girl has two ponies of her own and they provide her with a great deal of enjoyment. She is luckier than some children as she lives by a big field called the Glen with swings, a slide and a seesaw to play on. She says riding also gives her a chance to see the countryside and wild animals and birds. There are two riding{schools}in Minster which anyone can go to either taking your own{pony}or riding one of theirs. She says that she enjoys{horse {riding}because she sees more of the island and its life.
